projects.title: AT&T Intern Innovation Challenge: AT&T Guardian
projects.bodyText:
- Designed and implemented tool to transcribe emergency calls for first responders, autofill incident reports, locate nearest units, and dispatch them to reduce response time
 -  Created full stack application using Python, Flask, React, and multiple large language models (LLMs)

projects.title: Brown University Deep Learning in Genomics Research
projects.bodyText:
- Replicated and developed multivariate time series transformer models to predict when complications were likely to occur in ECMO patients using Python and PyTorch
 - Researched ML applications for discovering drug repurposing using drug-drug interactions

projects.title: Hack@Brown 2024: SpaceOut
projects.bodyText:
- Developed networking tool for entrepreneurs by allowing users to exchange business pitches
 - Spearheaded agile development team to build full stack application using Python, HTML/CSS, and Flask
